response.job_title: Always curious to find new ways to innovate through product and process design | Chemical Engineer | Purpose-Driven Entrepreneur |
response.summary:
My passion is to impact people and the multiple environments I unfold myself in with innovation and creative problem solving abilities, all focused in developing products and processes that are self-sustainable in the long run.

As an Chemical Engineer I have gained a specific mindset to solve problems based on critically understanding the processes and multiple socio-technical interactions behind each issue and finding solutions that are innovative and have a specific focus on the complete life cycle of product and process systems.

During my years as a student at the Universidad Nacional de Colombia I was able to acquire knowledge to design, develop, operate and manage processes for the physical, chemical and biological transformation of raw materials into useful products, with these skills I personally focused on developing food products for the Latin American market as a young entrepreneur.

I have also had the opportunity to study at Concordia University during an international mobility program in which I focused on gaining experience and knowledge in topics such as entrepreneurship, product development, innovation and the critical understanding of how technology impacts our society through different viewpoints. For this international experience I was also a selected candidate for the Emerging Leaders in the Americas Program (ELAP) scholarship offered by the Government of Canada.

To top it all off, I am currently developing a startup in the Agri-Food Tech sector with all of the knowledge and experience I have. This personal endeavour was born from a course project at university and has been strengthened over time with the help of numerous connections and highly knowledgeable individuals in the Colombian entrepreneurship ecosystem.

If you would like to get to know me better or feel that connecting can add value to a personal or professional project in development lets get in touch with a message or call me at +57 312 479 0960.
response.skills: Problem Solving, Analytical Skills, Leadership, Public Speaking, Product Innovation, Front End Engineering Design (FEED), Piping and Instrumentation Drawing (P&ID), Process Simulation, Team Building, Community Outreach, Networking, Prototyping, Food Design, Process Engineering, Sustainable Design, Sustainability, Research, Project Management, Marketing, International Relations

profile_positions.description: Process Engineer with experience in Front-End Engineering Design (FEED) for Workshare Projects with the Houston and Calgary offices in the Oil & Gas and Lipids & Edible Oils Industries.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Startup focused on the development of innovative and sustainable products from agro resources with the help of science and technology.

Our first and current project is Koji Burger, a brand that seeks to overcome the current hurdles in the Colombian beef market with japanese inspired technological innovation and attention to detail in sustainable sourcing and practices within the beef industry.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder and CINO

profile_positions.description:
During my time at the OSFD I had the opportunity to lead the Ambassador Program, a commission based internship that sought to build relationships around Food Design in the offline and online world through education.

Additionally I debuted as a speaker at the first International Festival of Gastroperformance and Food Designers at AREANDINA with my talk "Food Design Entrepreneurship: Designing the Food Brands of Tomorrow."
profile_positions.title: Ambassador - Colombia
Junior Professional in Research, Development and Innovation (R+D+i)
